Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Maximize average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Blocker Resolution Time
Description: Minimize the average time taken to resolve blockers

Name: Maximize Feature Delivery
Description: Maximize number of features delivered within sprint deadlines

Name: Maximize Employee Availability
Description: Maximize availability of employees for sprint tasks

Name: Minimize Sprint Overruns
Description: Minimize deviation from sprint planned effort

Name: Maximize Product Owner Involvement
Description: Maximize availability of Product Owner for backlog grooming and sprint planning

Name: Maximize Team Satisfaction
Description: Maximize team satisfaction measured in sprint retrospectives

Name: Maximize Skill Coverage
Description: Maximize number of required skills covered by team members

Name: Minimize Unplanned Work
Description: Minimize tasks blocked or added mid-sprint
